channel.title: I'm #10 on top posters list
channel.description:
Woot. I was just looking at the stats and noticed that :) I am quite active here, everyone's usually so nice too, so it's a warm community.
I'm exactly 57 minutes away from being in the top 10 of most online also.
Anything about yourselves that you guys are proud of?

item.title: I'm #10 on top posters list
item.dc:creator: @kuiren2 Kuiren
item.description:
@kuiren2 wrote:

my online time is legit to i dont even know how to turn on the opera auto refresher i mostly have mopar in the background while playing games and talking on msn and myspace

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

jme_009:

Pathetically, I can’t say I have auto-refreshed. My 7 days and 23 hours is all legit. I should cut back Im a little addicted.

My 4 days, 17 hours and 6 minutes are all legit also

Read full topic

item.title: I'm #10 on top posters list
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Hey, that’s pretty cool man. Personally I just post on Moparisthebest while I’m wating for things to compile, which ends up being a long fucking time with java on a relatively slow computer.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm #10 on top posters list
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Well, to be honest I am coding the majority of the time.

75 minutes a day I am in Computer Science class, with mopar’s forums opened in the background. Although, all my school teaches is VB and for some reason the highest level in computer science teaches html, rofl. If they taught us Java or something better I’d be much more productive here.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm #10 on top posters list
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I only post to socialize also. Postcounts mean nothing to me, I was just amazed I was in the Top 10.

item.title: I'm #10 on top posters list
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:23, topic:3688”][quote author=Cheesehunk link=topic=4493.msg44926#msg44926 date=1149804658]

Wow, I posted like crazy and nothing not even 10th… sigh but oh well, sites still number 1 =)

rofl this topics cheap… Oh well anything to raise my post count =P

Dude, this forum is not about getting number 1 on the posters list…

If people didn’t spend all their time trying to get lots of posts, and actually did something it would be a better place.

Don’t get me wrong, I like this place, infact I was the top user online in its first couple of weeks. I just think people need to stop posting useless stuff, and spamming up the forums.

No offence, but I liked Kaitnieks.com better, although Mopar and the Admins have done an extrordinary job of reviving it.
[/quote]

I do post a lot, but I only try to socialize. Of course, my goal has never been to get as many posts as possible [/quote]

I was going to say, jme is one of the few with a very high post count that does not include useless spam, but I geuss I forgot!

I forgot what else I was going to post…

I think I have a disease!

Read full topic

item.title: I'm #10 on top posters list
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“ipl0x, post:26, topic:3688”][quote author=yna_ajhear5 link=topic=4493.msg44980#msg44980 date=1149811075]
Well when you say “Oh well anything to raise my post count =P”, you come off as a guy trying to post only for post count. This should not be the case at Moparisthebest, or Any forum. If you are going to act this way, or even think about it, I suggest you leave now before you cause any trouble.
[/quote]

rofl shut up mom, you sound like someones mother.

Edit: could some admin or whoever please close this topic before anyone else can post, thanks.[/quote]

I agree it needs to be locked, however all your doing is inducing an unneccessary flame war. What yna said is right.

Read full topic
